H0.text: Which fictional UK television doctor lives in Tannochbrae. Dr. Cameron

H1.text: Which fictional UK television doctor lives in Tannochbrae. Dr. Monk

H2.text: Which fictional UK television doctor lives in Tannochbrae. Dr. Who

H3.text: Which fictional UK television doctor lives in Tannochbrae. Dr Finlay

A4.text: Based on A. J. Cronin's 1935 novella Country Doctor, the storylines centred on a general medical practice in the fictional Scottish town of Tannochbrae during the late 1920s.
